What is the best way to add persistance to parts?

1. custom structure in PluginData: I use this when i want to store global settings

2. public virtual void onFlightStateSave(Dictionary<string, KSPParseable> partDataCollection); :Internal per/vessel data?

3. PartModules. :per/vessel data, modifiable by the user?

I guess the real question here is whether method 3 is eventually going to replace method 2?
